attributes.action: ask the police to arrest him for fraud and treason
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister has given away Britain's sovereignty and democracy without the authorisation of the British people. He has no right to do this as his party was elected on the promise that they would ask the people and at no point have the British people been asked.
The Prime Minister has therefore signed away Britain's sovereignty illegally and should face the consequences of his actions.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
